722005f-a.text:
96-98 Orchard Street, east side, between Broome and Delancey Streets.
April 7, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.

722007f-a.text:
Orchard Street, north from and including Broome Street. The view shows the pushcarts peddler's market on Orchard Street.
April 28, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
